textsArr: Fill small bowl with water
Remove leafstalks from 1 sprigs of fresh coriander
Peel 2 mangoes with peeler and cut into cubes of 2 centimeters side length
Place mango cubes into empty medium-sized bowl
Peel 1 large red onion and slice into slices of 2 milimeters thickness
Place onion slices into small bowl with water
Keep onions in small bowl for 10 minutes
Finely chop coriander
Add coriander to medium-sized bowl with mangoes
Cut 1 fresh chili pepper into halves lengthwise
Remove seeds from chili peppers with knife point
Slice chili peppers into slices of 2 milimeters width
Add chili pepper slices and 0.25 teaspoons of salt to medium-sized bowl with mangoes
Cut 4 limes into halves
Squeeze limes out with lemon squeezer into medium-sized bowl with mangoes
Drain onions
Add drained onions to mango ceviche and stir gently
Place ceviche into fridge
Keep ceviche in fridge for 5 minutes
plan.name: Mango Ceviche

textsArr: Place 240 grams basmati rice into sieve
Rinse rice with cold running water until water runs clear
Drain rice
Add 520 milliliters water to medium-sized saucepan and bring to the boil
Add drained rice and 1 pinches of salt to saucepan
Cover saucepan with lid and cook on lowest heat for 20 minutes
plan.name: Basmati Rice

textsArr: Rinse 240 grams quinoa in sieve with cold running water
Drain quinoa
Place quinoa into medium-sized saucepan
Add 600 milliliters water into saucepan to cover content
Cover saucepan with lid
Bring water to the boil over medium heat
Stir quinoa
Cover saucepan with lid and cook on lowest heat for 15 minutes
Rinse cooked quinoa in sieve with cold water
Drain quinoa
Heat 1 tablespoons of olive oil in medium-sized frying pan until hot
Add quinoa to frying pan and sauté for 5 minutes
plan.name: Sautéed Quinoa

Cover saucepan with lid and cook on lowest heat for 15 minutes

Heat 1 tablespoons of olive oil in medium-sized frying pan until hot
Add quinoa to frying pan and sauté for 5 minutes
plan.name: Sautéed Quinoa

textsArr: Rinse 230 grams fresh spinach leaves with water
Dry spinach with salad spinner
Evenly spread spinach leaves on serving platter
Wash 2 fresh tomatoes and cut into small pieces
Evenly spread tomato pieces on spinach
Cut 2 avocados into halves
Remove stones from avocados
Peel avocados and cut into small pieces
Evenly spread avocado pieces on tomatoes and spinach
Peel 1 shallot and chop finely
Evenly spread chopped shallots on salad
Cut 6 precooked beetroots into thin slices
Evenly spread beetroot slices on salad
Add 1 tablespoons of dijon mustard, 120 milliliters olive oil and 120 milliliters balsamic vinegar to small bowl
Whisk mustard, oil and vinegar until well combined
Crumble 100 grams feta
Top salad with crumbled feta
Pour oil vinegar dressing over beetroot avocado salad
plan.name: Beetroot Avocado Salad

Evenly spread avocado pieces on tomatoes and spinach
Peel 1 shallot and chop finely
Evenly spread chopped shallots on salad
Cut 6 precooked beetroots into thin slices

Add 1 tablespoons of dijon mustard, 120 milliliters olive oil and 120 milliliters balsamic vinegar to small bowl

Crumble 100 grams feta
Top salad with crumbled feta
Pour oil vinegar dressing over beetroot avocado salad
plan.name: Beetroot Avocado Salad

textsArr: Add 7 deciliters water, 300 grams ice cubes and 1 teaspoons of salt to large bowl
Mix salt and water until well combined
Peel 1 red onion and slice finely
Add onion slices to salted water
Soak onions in salted water for 30 minutes
Cut 1 lemon into halves
Juice lemons
Add lemon juice to empty medium-sized bowl
Wash 1 fresh chili pepper with cold water and cut into halves lengthwise
Scrape seeds out of chili peppers
Finely chop chili pepper halves
Add chopped chili peppers, 1 pinch of salt and 1 pinches of ground pepper to lemon juice
Add 1 tablespoons of olive oil to lemon juice
Drain onion slices with sieve
Rinse onions with cold running water
Add onion slices to dressing
Mix red onion salad until well combined
Let salad rest for 1 hour
plan.name: Red Onion Salad

textsArr: Wash 1 heads of broccoli with cold water
Cut off florets from broccoli
Preheat oven to 230 degrees celsius
Add broccoli florets and 3 tablespoons of olive oil to medium-sized bowl
Season broccoli with 1 pinches of ground pepper and 1 pinches of salt
Line baking tray with baking parchment
Mix broccoli, spices and oil until well combined
Scatter broccoli evenly across baking tray
Bake broccoli in the pre-heated oven at 230 degrees celsius for 15 minutes
plan.name: Baked Broccoli

textsArr: Wash 2 large potatoes firmly with cold water and peel with peeler
Finely cut potatoes into large sticks
Preheat oven to 220 degrees celsius
Line baking tray with baking parchment
Transfer potatoes to baking tray
Drizzle 2.5 tablespoons of olive oil generously over potatoes
Mix potatoes and oil until well combined
Bake potatoes in the oven at 220 degrees celsius for 25 minutes
Transfer baked potatoes to serving platter
Season baked potatoes lightly with 0.75 teaspoons of salt
plan.name: Oven Baked Potato Fries

textsArr: Wash 1 cucumber firmly with cold water and peel
Roughly cut cucumber into thin slices
Add cucumber slices to medium-sized bowl
Pour 1 tablespoons of white wine vinegar gently over cucumber slices
Season cucumber slices with 0.5 teaspoons of salt and 0.25 teaspoons of ground pepper
Sprinkle 0.5 teaspoons of dried rosemary evenly over cucumber slices
Drizzle 1 tablespoons of olive oil generously over cucumber slices
Peel 1 red onion and cut finely into thin slices
Transfer onion slices to bowl
Mix cucumber and onion salad until well combined
Cool salad in fridge for 10 minutes
plan.name: Cucumber And Onion Salad

textsArr: Wash 1 small potato gently with cold water and peel
Peel 0.5 small onion and chop roughly
Wash 1 heads of broccoli gently with cold water
Add 1 teaspoons of olive oil to medium-sized saucepan and heat carefully over high heat until hot
Add onions to hot olive oil
Sauté onions on high heat until soft
Roughly chop potato
Roughly cut broccoli into medium-sized pieces
Add potatoes and broccoli to sautéed onions
Sauté onions, potatoes and broccoli on medium heat for 2 minutes
Prepare 350 milliliters chicken stock according to instructions on packaging
Pour chicken stock gently over sauteed vegetables
Pour 150 milliliters milk gently over sauteed vegetables
Boil milk and stock mixture on high heat for 2 minutes
Cook broccoli soup on low heat for 12 minutes
Let soup cool down to room temperature
Blend soup with hand blender until smooth
Bring soup to the boil over high heat
Season soup lightly with 0.25 teaspoons of ground pepper
plan.name: Cream Of Broccoli Soup

textsArr: Wash 1 heads of broccoli with cold water
Cut off florets from broccoli
Preheat oven to 230 degrees celsius
Add broccoli florets and 3 tablespoons of olive oil to medium-sized bowl
Season broccoli with 1 pinches of ground pepper and 1 pinches of salt
Line baking tray with baking parchment
Mix broccoli, spices and oil until well combined
Scatter broccoli evenly across baking tray
Bake broccoli in the pre-heated oven at 230 degrees celsius for 15 minutes
plan.name: Baked Broccoli

textsArr: Wash 2 large potatoes firmly with cold water and peel with peeler
Finely cut potatoes into large sticks
Preheat oven to 220 degrees celsius
Line baking tray with baking parchment
Transfer potatoes to baking tray
Drizzle 2.5 tablespoons of olive oil generously over potatoes
Mix potatoes and oil until well combined
Bake potatoes in the oven at 220 degrees celsius for 25 minutes
Transfer baked potatoes to serving platter
Season baked potatoes lightly with 0.75 teaspoons of salt
plan.name: Oven Baked Potato Fries

textsArr: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius
Wash 4 small potatoes firmly with cold water
Prick potatoes well with knife point
Place potatoes on small round baking tray
Season potatoes lightly with 0.5 teaspoons of salt
Drizzle 1.5 tablespoons of olive oil generously over potatoes
Mix potatoes, salt and oil until well combined
Bake potatoes in the oven at 180 degrees celsius for 90 minutes
Roughly score baked potatoes with knife
Stuff 3 tablespoons of grated cheddar into baked potatoes
plan.name: Baked Potatoes with Cheese

textsArr: Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius
Wash 4 small carrots firmly with cold water and peel with peeler
Roughly cut peeled carrots into halves lengthwise
Transfer carrot halves to small casserole dish
Drizzle 0.5 tablespoons of olive oil evenly over carrots
Bake casserole dish in the pre-heated oven at 200 degrees celsius for 20 minutes
Remove casserole dish carefully from oven
Season baked carrots with 1 pinches of salt and 0.25 teaspoons of powdered garlic
Sprinkle 0.25 teaspoons of dried basil and 0.25 teaspoons of dried rosemary evenly over carrots
Drizzle 1 tablespoons of lemon juice evenly over carrots
Mix content of casserole dish with spatula until well combined
plan.name: Tangy Roasted Carrots

textsArr: Wash 2 large potatoes firmly with cold water and peel with peeler
Finely cut potatoes into large sticks
Preheat oven to 220 degrees celsius
Line baking tray with baking parchment
Transfer potatoes to baking tray
Drizzle 2.5 tablespoons of olive oil generously over potatoes
Mix potatoes and oil until well combined
Bake potatoes in the oven at 220 degrees celsius for 25 minutes
Transfer baked potatoes to serving platter
Season baked potatoes lightly with 0.75 teaspoons of salt
plan.name: Oven Baked Potato Fries

textsArr: Rinse 240 grams quinoa in sieve with cold running water
Drain quinoa
Place quinoa into medium-sized saucepan
Add 600 milliliters water into saucepan to cover content
Cover saucepan with lid
Bring water to the boil over medium heat
Stir quinoa
Cover saucepan with lid and cook on lowest heat for 15 minutes
Rinse cooked quinoa in sieve with cold water
Drain quinoa
Heat 1 tablespoons of olive oil in medium-sized frying pan until hot
Add quinoa to frying pan and sauté for 5 minutes
plan.name: Sautéed Quinoa

textsArr: Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius
Wash 3 small carrots firmly with cold water and peel
Roughly cut carrots into big pieces
Place carrots on small round baking tray
Season carrots lightly with 0.5 teaspoons of salt
Sprinkle 0.25 teaspoons of dried rosemary evenly over carrots
Drizzle 1 tablespoons of olive oil evenly over carrots
Mix carrots and spices until well combined
Bake carrots in the oven at 200 degrees celsius for 20 minutes
plan.name: Baked Carrots

actions.text: Cut 280 grams sushi grade flounder filets into dice of 1 centimeter side length
Place flounder dice into sieve
Rinse flounder with cold water, drain and pat dry with kitchen papers
Cut 1 fresh chili pepper into halves lengthwise
Cut 3 limes into halves
Squeeze lime halves into medium-sized bowl
Add flounder dice to bowl
Mix fish and juice until well combined
Marinate flounder dice for 2.5 minutes in bowl
Remove seeds from chili peppers with knife point
Slice chili pepper halves into thin slices of 0.25 centimeters thickness
Add chili pepper slices to bowl
Peel 1 shallot and cut into quarters
Slice shallot quarters into thin slices of 0.25 centimeters thickness
Add shallot slices to bowl
Season flounder ceviche with 1 pinches of salt
Mix ceviche until well combined
Peel 2 cloves of fresh garlic and chop roughly
Cut 1 fresh chili pepper into halves lengthwise
Remove seeds from chili peppers with knife point
Roughly chop chili peppers
Peel 2 centimeters fresh ginger and chop roughly
Wash 1 stalks of fresh lemongrass
Cut off bottom from lemongrass
Smash lemongrass with rolling pin
Peel 500 grams sweet potatoes and chop roughly
Wash 20 grams fresh coriander
Separate leaves of coriander from stems
Add 1 teaspoons of olive oil to large saucepan and heat-up until hot
Chop coriander stems
Add chopped garlic, chopped chili peppers and chopped ginger to saucepan
Add smashed lemongrass, chopped coriander stems and 2 tablespoons of red curry paste to saucepan
Cook spices on lowest heat for 2.5 minutes
Prepare 750 milliliters chicken stock according to instructions on packaging
Add chicken stock, 160 milliliters coconut cream and chopped sweet potatoes to saucepan
Cook sweet potato soup on medium heat for 15 minutes
Cut 2 chicken breasts into slices of 0.5 centimeter thickness
Remove lemongrass from soup
Transfer soup to blender and blend until smooth
Transfer soup to saucepan
Add chicken to saucepan
Cook chicken and sweet potato soup on medium heat for 10 minutes
Chop coriander leaves
Squeeze 1 lime out into saucepan
Add 1 teaspoons of white sugar and 0.5 teaspoons of fish sauce to saucepan
Gently stir chicken and sweet potato soup
Scatter coriander leaves across chicken and sweet potato soup
Rinse 240 grams quinoa in sieve with cold running water
Drain quinoa
Place quinoa into medium-sized saucepan
Add 600 milliliters water into saucepan to cover content
Cover saucepan with lid
Bring water to the boil over medium heat
Stir quinoa
Cover saucepan with lid and cook on lowest heat for 15 minutes
Rinse cooked quinoa in sieve with cold water
Drain quinoa
Heat 1 tablespoons of olive oil in medium-sized frying pan until hot
Add quinoa to frying pan and sauté for 5 minutes
Fill small bowl with water
Remove leafstalks from 1 sprigs of fresh coriander
Peel 2 mangoes with peeler and cut into cubes of 2 centimeters side length
Place mango cubes into empty medium-sized bowl
Peel 1 large red onion and slice into slices of 2 milimeters thickness
Place onion slices into small bowl with water
Keep onions in small bowl for 10 minutes
Finely chop coriander
Add coriander to medium-sized bowl with mangoes
Cut 1 fresh chili pepper into halves lengthwise
Remove seeds from chili peppers with knife point
Slice chili peppers into slices of 2 milimeters width
Add chili pepper slices and 0.25 teaspoons of salt to medium-sized bowl with mangoes
Cut 4 limes into halves
Squeeze limes out with lemon squeezer into medium-sized bowl with mangoes
Drain onions
Add drained onions to mango ceviche and stir gently
Place ceviche into fridge
Keep ceviche in fridge for 5 minutes
Wash 2 large potatoes firmly with cold water and peel with peeler
Finely cut potatoes into large sticks
Preheat oven to 220 degrees celsius
Line baking tray with baking parchment
Transfer potatoes to baking tray
Drizzle 2.5 tablespoons of olive oil generously over potatoes
Mix potatoes and oil until well combined
Bake potatoes in the oven at 220 degrees celsius for 25 minutes
Transfer baked potatoes to serving platter
Season baked potatoes lightly with 0.75 teaspoons of salt
